description: Detects any assembly DLL being loaded by an Office Product
author: Antonlovesdnb
false_positives: Legitimate macro usage. Add the appropriate filter according to your environment
name: DotNET DLL Loaded Via Office Applications
query: (process.executable.text:(*\\excel.exe OR *\\mspub.exe OR *\\outlook.exe OR *\\powerpnt.exe OR *\\winword.exe) AND dll.path:C\:\\Windows\\assembly\\*)
